2:
Text: Triumph the Insult Comic Dog:  A Yugoslavian Mountain Hound, Triumph often puffs a cigar, which usually falls out of his mouth when he starts talking.

Triplets:<Triumph the Insult Comic Dog
3:
--------------------
Text: Triumph the Insult Comic Dog:  He debuted in 1997 on NBC's "Late Night with Conan O'Brien" and also appeared on "The Tonight Show with Conan O'Brien" from time to time, as well as the short-lived "TV Funhouse", TBS's "Conan", and Adult Swim's "The Jack and Triumph Show".
